ygData.subject: Extracting all occurences of a document

Hi there

I am using Heritrix as part of my application, and I would really=
 like 
to extract all of the occurences of some documents on a website.

Fo=
r example: 
- I am crawling www.somesite.com
- The image img.jpg appears on=
 the pages www.somesite.com/page1.html 
and www.somesite.com/page2.html
- I=
 want to be able to know that img.jpg occurs on both of these pages 
using =
Heritrix's output

At the moment I am going over the log files, but I have =
discovered that 
Heritrix ignores documents that it already seen, and it do=
es not even 
log a message about them.

Do you know of a way I can get that=
 information from Heritrix?

Thanks in advance,
Joey
